title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.12 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.12 - Public notice

State Regulations

In each office of the fund, a notice shall be posted
stating: (a) The time and location
where records shall be made available for inspection and copying; (b) The name, title, business address and
business telephone number of the records access officer and fiscal officer of
the fund; and
(c) The right to
appeal by any applicant denied access to a record for whatever reason and the
name and business address of the fund's general manager, the person to whom an
appeal is to be directed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1550.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
